title: Seeding Gold: A Fertile Retelling of Rapunzel
description: Once upon a time, a young woman was trapped in a tower... Raised by a witch, Rapunzel is innocent of the ways of the world until the day a prince climbs up into her isolated prison. Enraptured by her beauty, the prince claims her untouched body, returning each night to fill her with his seed. But when her fertile womb betrays their secret to the witch, can Rapunzel escape with her life and her prince?
author: Cordova Skye
